alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:21AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Mix This Morning... .A wintry mix of rain, freezing rain, and snow will shift into portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin this morning. Areas of fog and freezing fog have been observed ahead of the precipitation arrival across the area. Recent cold weather and frozen ground could lead to a glaze of ice accumulation on untreated surfaces. Additionally, snow accumulations of up to 1 inch are possible. Precipitation will move east of the area by the afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
